title: Crockpot Sweet Potato Lentils
directions: Place the sweet potatoes, vegetable broth, onion, garlic, and spices in a crockpot. Cook on high for 3 hours, until vegetables are soft.
Add the lentils and stir once. Replace the lid and cook on high for an additional 1½ hours.
Stir in the coconut milk and as much water as needed to get the right consistency. Coupons
ingredients: 2 teaspoon each ground coriander, garam masala, and chili powder
